code: @Override public Processor createProcessor(RouteContext routeContext) {     Processor answer = definition.getProcessor().     if (answer == null) {         ObjectHelper.notNull(definition.getRef(), "ref", definition).         answer = routeContext.mandatoryLookup(definition.getRef(), Processor.class).     }     // (a Processor must be a Service to be enlisted in JMX)     if (!(answer instanceof Service)) {         if (answer instanceof AsyncProcessor) {             // the processor is async by nature so use the async delegate             answer = new DelegateAsyncProcessor(answer).         } else {             // the processor is sync by nature so use the sync delegate             answer = new DelegateSyncProcessor(answer).         }     }     return answer. }
